name: One Soup Two Soup
starterCode:
if (orders[0] == "Tomato Soup") {​
	GOTO("Pantry")​
	GET("Broth")​
	GOTO("Station 1")​
	PLACE("A", 0)​

	GOTO("Pantry")​
	GET("Tomato")​
	GOTO("Station 1")​
	PLACE("A", 1)​

}​
if (orders[0] == "Potato Soup") {​
	GOTO("Pantry")​
	GET("Broth")​
	GOTO("Station 1")​
	PLACE("A", 0)​

	GOTO("Pantry")​
	GET("Potato")​
	GOTO("Station 1")​
	PLACE("A", 1)​

}​

GOTO("Station 1")​
ACTIVATE("A")​

TAKE("A")​

GOTO("Window")​

DELIVER()
